name: Kerala Honeymoon Tour
description:
The idyllic destination for honeymooning couples is the rustic and inviting land of Kerala. Providing the amorous setting is our tour package. Cuddle up at the dreamy hill station of Munnar with cool breeze and aroma of tea wafting through and sink in the panoramic views from Tour Top Station.

At Periyar, spot exotic wildlife in their natural habitat and cruise along the emerald green waters at the comfort of luxurious houseboats in Alleppey. Also, unravel the quaint streets of Kochi together and take back home with you pleasant memories.
